group_1.textLeft: What the hell? This isn't right...

group_1.textRight: There's way more people than there's @supposed to be!

group_1.textLeft: Where the fuck is the rest of Torayamachi @hiding?!

group_1.textCenter: Over there...?!
Tch!
I can't stand sneak attacks...

group_1.textRight: We need to pick them off one by one!

group_1.textLeft: We've been counting them as we go along! @There's, like, thirty of them!
There's no way that's right!

group_1.textRight: Ranka, what the heck is happening...? @Torayamachi doesn't have this many members...

group_1.textLeft: The stones on the bridges... @Did they move them all here...?
And now they're using them to @disorient us...
They're gonna take us out before @we can find them...

group_1.textRight: (I have to get out of here and find Juri...)
(If she or Yuna die before I can get them to @Monzenbashi, I won't be able to achieve @my objective...!)
(But for now, I need to get out of here. I'll skip @getting a Game Over with the rest of these girls.)
*Blep~*

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru, where are you right now?
You didn't tell me about those stones.

group_1.textRight: I wasn't told about them, either.
I think it must've been a last-minute @change...
By the way, I'm with Yuna right now!

group_1.textLeft: Tell me where she is!

group_1.textRight: The thing is, Torayamachi's about to @surround Juri.
They'll get you too if you show up @here without a good plan.

group_1.textLeft: But if Juri gets taken down by Yuna, we won't @be able to complete our mission, you know~...

group_1.textRight: ...Good point.
Okay, I'll tell you where we are so you @can catch up with us.

group_1.textCenter: Now that I know where Hikaru is...
I should be able to lure both gangs to @Monzenbashi...
If I can convince Ranka, @I'm sure I can do it.
(I'll use her just as much as she used @me before I crush her...)

group_1.textRight: Now, for the sake of my fallen teammates@and myself... I'll burn you to a crisp!
I hope ya like it well done.

group_1.textLeft: Fine. Bring it on.

group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]HAAAH!
Tsk.

group_1.textCenter: A flamethrower isn't too useful at close @range, is it?

group_1.textRight: [chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02]Don't fuckin' look down on me!

group_1.textCenter: [se:3001_chara_damage][chara:102102:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Ngh–!

group_1.textRight: At this range, @I can just crack ya with it.
And if you dodge,@I can get as much distance as I need to.

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:explosion][se:8000_flame_01_s]BUUUUURN!!
[chara:102400:effect_7002_damage01][se:3001_chara_damage][bgEffect:shakeSmall]GAH!
Urgh... Who the hell just hit me...?!

group_1.textLeft: Who else could it have been? @It was me...

group_1.textCenter: Target redirection, huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Correct. @So when I struck this tire...
You took the hit along with it.

group_1.textCenter: You really are nothing but cheap-ass tricks!
And on top of that, you're WAY too fuckin' naive!
[se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02]How dare someone like YOU think you could @match me!

group_1.textLeft: [se:8001_flame_01_v][chara:102102:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Ugh...!

group_1.textCenter: C'mon, don't frown like that. @I kept it on low heat...

group_1.textLeft: Heh.

group_1.textCenter: What's so funny?

group_1.textLeft: This fight is already over.

group_1.textCenter: Wha–?!

group_1.textRight: So you lured me into a trap, @huh...
Fine. If you wanna play that way,
let's see how many Juri the Great can @kill before she goes down!
And I'll make sure you're the last one@I take out, Yuna!

group_1.textLeft: Are you really fine with that?

group_1.textCenter: STOP!

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru...!

group_1.textRight: It's true that taking out Juri will @put an end to Ryuugasaki...
But we shouldn't kill her here!
We could capture her and decide what @to do later, couldn't we?

group_1.textLeft: Will you shut the fuck up, you little twerp?!

group_1.textRight: Besides, this isn't the one-on-one battle you @wanted, Juri~

group_1.textLeft: Ao...

group_1.textRight: If we retreat to Monzenbashi, @we can regroup with Ranka and the others.
That way, you can fight Yuna the way @you wanted to~
You wouldn't be satisfied if you went @down like this, would you...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Can I really trust you on this?

group_1.textRight: Of course you can. @Ranka even agreed with it.

group_1.textLeft: Gotcha. @Let's go, Ao!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: What is she thinking...?
Everyone, @we're heading to Monzenbashi!
